column1: Baby Barnaby's////I love the adult version of Barnaby's
column2: so I was very excited to try Baby Barnaby's.  They had water and coffee sitting out for us while we waited
column3: and the wait wasn't long (just 10 - 15 minutes)
column4: because we asked for first available.  We ended up outside.  It was way too hot to be eating outside (I'm from the Midwest
column6: but we did get seated much faster.
